template.name: Synchronizer
ConveyorBelt
ProcessingStation
template.parameter: id s_id, int pt, int pos

transition.label: busy[s_id - NS]
synch4?
ready[s_id - NS] = false, pieceAvailable[s_id - NS] = false

template.name: QueueSensor
template.parameter: id s_id, id b_id, int pos, bool active

template.name: control_station
template.parameter: int policy, id s_id, id b_id

query.comment:
The plant never incurs in deadlock.
Verified for every configuration.

query.formula: A[] Station1.nPieces() <= 1 and Station2.nPieces() <= 1 and Station3.nPieces() <= 1 and Station5.nPieces() <= 1 and Station5.nPieces() <= 1 and Station6.nPieces() <= 1
query.comment:
No processing station ever holds more than 1 piece.
Verified for every configuration.

After the initialization, the belt will always hold exactly the starting amount of pieces --> it never happens that two pieces occupy the same belt slot.
Verified for every configuration.

query.formula: A[] (isQueueFull(QueueSensor1.b_id, QueueSensor1.pos) imply !belt[QueueSensor1.b_id][QueueSensor1.pos - 1]) and (isQueueFull(QueueSensor2.b_id, QueueSensor2.pos) imply !belt[QueueSensor2.b_id][QueueSensor2.pos - 1]) and (isQueueFull(QueueSensor3.b_id, QueueSensor3.pos) imply !belt[QueueSensor3.b_id][QueueSensor3.pos - 1]) and (isQueueFull(QueueSensor4.b_id, QueueSensor4.pos) imply !belt[QueueSensor4.b_id][QueueSensor4.pos - 1]) and (isQueueFull(QueueSensor5.b_id, QueueSensor5.pos) imply !belt[QueueSensor5.b_id][QueueSensor5.pos - 1]) and (isQueueFull(QueueSensor6.b_id, QueueSensor6.pos) imply !belt[QueueSensor6.b_id][QueueSensor6.pos - 1])
query.comment:
No queue ever exceeds the maximum allowed length.
Verified for configurations 1, 2 but not for configuration 3 (on purpose)

query.formula: A[] policy == 2 imply Station3.counter == 0 and Station4.counter == 0
query.comment: If policy = 2 --> never go through stations 3 or 4
